DOC.brief_summary: This open-label , prospective , randomize , control study safety efficacy include clinical , immunologic , virologic assessment add Ampligen `` HAART '' HIV infect patient CD4 count > 300 HIV-1 plasma RNA > 500 < 30,000 copies/ml ( PCR ) .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Efficacy Ampligen Treatment HIV Patients Failing HAART
DOC.criteria: 1 . Adults least 18 year age . 2 . CD4 cell count > 300 cell . 3 . HIV1 plasma RNA > 500 < 30,000 copies/ml . A qualifying ( `` screen '' ) HIV1 RNA level > 500 < 30,000 copies/ml must document least within 40 day prior start Baseline patient receive HAART regimen contain least two follow antiretroviral drug : Abacavir ( Ziagen ) Zidovudine ( Retrovir ) AZT Zalcitabine ( Hivid ) ddC Didanosine ( Videx ) ddI Stavudine ( Zerit ) d4T Efavirenz ( Sustiva ) Indinavir ( Crixivan ) Ritonavir ( Norvir ) Nelfinavir ( Viracept ) Amprenavir ( Agenerase ) The patient must take HAART regimen four month long time qualify HIV1 RNA determination . 4 . History prior treatment ( include current HAART regimen ) least one protease inhibitor ( PI ) least two nucleoside reverse transcriptase inhibitor ( NRTI ) and/or least one nonnucleoside reverse transcriptase inhibitor ( NNRTI ) least two nucleoside reverse transcriptase inhibitor ( NRTI ) . 5 . Karnofsky performance status least 70 . 6 . The following laboratory parameter within 14 day prior treatment : Hemoglobin > 9.2 g/dL men > 8.9 g/dL woman Neutrophil count > 1000 Platelet count > 75,000 AST/ALT < 4.0 x upper limit normal ( ULN ) Serum creatinine < 1.5 x ULN creatinine clearance > 50 mL/min . 7 . For female child bear potential : A negative serum pregnancy test within 14 day prior randomization . Males females child bear potential agree use effective mean contraception .
